error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'susan_initial_cats' (value: 21) was used instead of 'susan_after_giving' (value: 17).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 18
After giving away four of her cats, Susan has 21 - 4 = <<21-4=17>>17.
Susan has 21 - 3 = <<21-3=18>>18 more cats than Bob
